businessmodel

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subject

    public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject
    A Class that represents a scheduler for an AssymblyLine. It makes a schedule for the assemblyLine. When the schedule has been complete a new day schedule is created
    Author:
    SWOP team 10
